text: Ronald Mehlich (born 26 September 1969, in Strzelce Opolskie) is a retired Polish athlete who specialised in the sprint hurdles. He represented his country at the 1997 World Championships, as well as two World Indoor Championships. He has personal bests of 13.44 seconds outdoors (Katowice 1997) and 7.61 seconds indoors (Valencia 1998).
